Name: active_projects_only
Description: Projects considered must have an active status

Name: exclude_resolved_blockers
Description: Resolved blockers should not be counted toward penalties

Name: user_stories_with_acceptance_criteria
Description: User stories must include acceptance criteria

Name: active_sprints_only
Description: Only sprints with active status are eligible

Name: prefer_certified_skills
Description: Prefer workers with certified skills for critical work

Name: roles_with_defined_responsibility
Description: Team roles must specify area of responsibility

Name: exclude_inactive_workers
Description: Workers with inactive status cannot be assigned

Name: goal_achievement_reported
Description: Sprint goals must report achievement status

Name: prefer_current_backlog
Description: Prefer product backlogs in a manageable status

Name: epics_with_valid_status
Description: Epics must have a valid status to be scheduled

Name: exclude_blocked_tasks
Description: Tasks with blocked status cannot be scheduled
